title: Loss Compensation!
body:
Hi there my name is Batwafflez,

 I am currently bronze 4 and on my way to bronze 3. About 7 minutes ago i had 93 lp and in my game our Zed had left, After losing the game I thought "Well atleast i dont lose much lp," but still lost 23 points.

This i believe is absolutely outrageous {{champion:44}} No but in all seriousness this is kind of annoying and i believe that if a loss compensation was piut in such as you dont lose lp if you have a AFK or you are able to leave a game with losing only 5 lp at max and a 5 minute ban

Please rito listen and just add it, Dota 2 has it why cant you!!!

replies.body:
They'll never implement a game by game Loss Prevention for people that AFK.
Unless if you can somehow magically figure out a way it can never be abused in any way shape or form.
make soloQ actually solo none of this duo shit. done
SoloQ is being replaced with Q with as many as you want.
i know which is even worse...

Hardly.
I have a friend that's too timid to enter ranked but would easily make gold with his skills as a support.
I've drastically improved my skills over the past year and semi-fixed my MMR, so I'll be Qing with two friends in the new season, which will make it so there is only a possible of 2 AFK/Feeders on my team.

Overall it will be a far better experience, especially for those that want to Q with multiple friends but couldn't.

No loss prevention isn't in for afk's, that would be able to be used to make losses less relevant by going afk if you are losing.

Loss Prevention is in the game for server side issues with a big red button that Rito hit in the case someone actually has to hit it.
